the similarity function implicitly deﬁnes a non-linear feature map φ(·).
Kernels are by deﬁnition functions k : X×X→ R for which there existsThe inputs Xof the
kernel function can
be very general, and
is not necessarily
restricted to RD.
a Hilbert space Hand φ: X→H a feature map such that
k(xi,xj) = ⟨φ(xi),φ(xj)⟩H . (12.52)
Draft (2019-10-15) of “Mathematics for Machine Learning”. Feedback:https://mml-book.com.
